org.ldaptive.io

Class LdifReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ldaptive.io.LdifReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SearchResultReader

    public class LdifReader
extends Object
implements SearchResultReader
    Reads an LDIF from a Reader and returns a SearchResult.
